summary:
Senior Project and Engineering Management Professional,  broadly skilled and experienced Business Generalist with specialties in medium to large EPC & EPCM Projects, Mining & Mineral Processing Plants, Infrastructure, Construction, Clean Power Generation and Mobility across all disciplines and commodities.

With more than 23 years in the industry, I am well-versed in leading successful large - projects to timely, profitable completion in challenging locations. Having worked on international projects in South Africa, Zimbabwe, the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Europe. 

Career Objectives: (Senior) Project Manager | Programme / Portfolio Manager

awards.title: Key Career Highlights - DRA Projects: Kibali
awards.description:
­With Project Schedule for the Ultra-Fine Grinding, Pump Cell and Carbon in Leach Upgrade top priority, executed equipment design, procurement and shipment to the DRC within 3 months, in compliance with stringent internal DRA management systems | Completed Test Work and Designs punctually to fast-track procurement and delivery – achieved with innovative Cost Savings for the Client.
­	
Achieved 1st gold mined 1 month early: from Site Establishment to first Gold Processing took only 20 months, with the project delivered on time and within budget, sporting 9.8 million Injury Free Man-Hours during construction. 
­	
Delivered New Diesel-Fired Carbon Regeneration Kiln under Budget and within Client’s Timeframe of 11 months: Successfully integrated new Kiln into existing plant with minimal downtime, Lost Time Injury (LTI) Free | Managed all Plant shutdowns, tie-ins and commissioning of new Kiln with Client’s Operation Team without any schedule slippage.

profile_positions.description:
Core Overview:
­	
Fulfilled 10 years of long service with management consulting firm supporting gold, platinum, copper and coal mines / mining houses with management, engineering, design, coordination and project execution. 
­	
Executed EPCM (Engineering, Procurement, Construction & Management), EPC (Engineering, Procurement & Construction) and LSTK (Lump Sum Turn Key) contracting projects.
­	
Dedicated the past 4.5 years in leadership capacities of 4 mega-projects at a combined cost of USD 159.1 Mil across the north eastern DRC, and Mpumalanga, Limpopo and North West Provinces of SA.
­	
Prior to this, spent the 1st 5.5 years in electrical and project engineering roles across similar geographies, managing 6 projects worth a total USD 1.2 Bil.

Project Manager                                                                                                        

Overview:
­	
Utilising a sound financial and quality control approach, develops and executes the overall project management plan, building a productive project culture via effective people management and team-building.
­	
Provides technical and functional leadership that secures effective implementation of projects within required scope, budget and timeframes. 
­	
Manages all related infrastructure / utilities packages, including detailed design, civil and structural construction, quality control, mechanical completion, commissioning and hand-over work.
­	
Devises and implements programmes in line with strategy to track, monitor and report on technical designs and construction milestones.
­	
Manages relationships with a broad range of internal and external stakeholders related to each project.
­	
Monitors and promotes environmental and health & safety compliance throughout each project to ensure a safe working environment.
­	
[Please note, further details available upon request (Comprehensive CV)]
